00115 DdNode *
00116 Cudd_Eval(
00117   DdManager * dd,
00118   DdNode * f,
00119   int * inputs)
00120 {
00121     int comple;
00122     DdNode *ptr;
00123 
00124     comple = Cudd_IsComplement(f);
00125     ptr = Cudd_Regular(f);
00126 
00127     while (!cuddIsConstant(ptr)) {
00128         if (inputs[ptr->index] == 1) {
00129             ptr = cuddT(ptr);
00130         } else {
00131             comple ^= Cudd_IsComplement(cuddE(ptr));
00132             ptr = Cudd_Regular(cuddE(ptr));
00133         }
00134     }
00135     return(Cudd_NotCond(ptr,comple));
00136 
00137 } /* end of Cudd_Eval */

00159 DdNode *
00160 Cudd_ShortestPath(
00161   DdManager * manager,
00162   DdNode * f,
00163   int * weight,
00164   int * support,
00165   int * length)
00166 {
00167     register    DdNode  *F;
00168     st_table    *visited;
00169     DdNode      *sol;
00170     cuddPathPair *rootPair;
00171     int         complement, cost;
00172     int         i;
00173 
00174     one = DD_ONE(manager);
00175     zero = DD_ZERO(manager);
00176 
00177     /* Initialize support. */
00178     if (support) {
00179         for (i = 0; i < manager->size; i++) {
00180             support[i] = 0;
00181         }
00182     }
00183 
00184     if (f == Cudd_Not(one) || f == zero) {
00185         *length = DD_BIGGY;
00186         return(Cudd_Not(one));
00187     }
00188     /* From this point on, a path exists. */
00189 
00190     /* Initialize visited table. */
00191     visited = st_init_table(st_ptrcmp, st_ptrhash);
00192 
00193     /* Now get the length of the shortest path(s) from f to 1. */
00194     (void) get_shortest(f, weight, support, visited);
00195 
00196     complement = Cudd_IsComplement(f);
00197 
00198     F = Cudd_Regular(f);
00199 
00200     st_lookup(visited, (char *)F, (char **)&rootPair);
00201     
00202     if (complement) {
00203         cost = rootPair->neg;
00204     } else {
00205         cost = rootPair->pos;
00206     }
00207 
00208     /* Recover an actual shortest path. */
00209     do {
00210         manager->reordered = 0;
00211         sol = get_path(manager,visited,f,weight,cost);
00212     } while (manager->reordered == 1);
00213 
00214     st_foreach(visited, free_path_pair, NULL);
00215     st_free_table(visited);
00216 
00217     *length = cost;
00218     return(sol);
00219 
00220 } /* end of Cudd_ShortestPath */

00252     zero = DD_ZERO(manager);
00253 
00254     if (f == Cudd_Not(one) || f == zero) {
00255         *length = DD_BIGGY;
00256         return(Cudd_Not(one));
00257     }
00258     /* From this point on, a path exists. */
00259 
00260     /* Initialize visited table. */
00261     visited = st_init_table(st_ptrcmp, st_ptrhash);
00262 
00263     /* Now get the length of the shortest path(s) from f to 1. */
00264     (void) get_largest(f, visited);
00265 
00266     complement = Cudd_IsComplement(f);

00273         cost = rootPair->neg;
00274     } else {
00275         cost = rootPair->pos;
00276     }
00277

00279     do {
00280         manager->reordered = 0;
00281         sol = get_cube(manager,visited,f,cost);
00282     } while (manager->reordered == 1);
00283

00308 int
00309 Cudd_ShortestLength(
00310   DdManager * manager,
00311   DdNode * f,
00312   int * weight)
00313 {
00314     register    DdNode  *F;
00315     st_table    *visited;
00316     cuddPathPair *my_pair;
00317     int         complement, cost;
00318 
00319     one = DD_ONE(manager);
00320     zero = DD_ZERO(manager);
00321 
00322     if (f == Cudd_Not(one) || f == zero) {
00323         return(DD_BIGGY);
00324     }
00325 
00326     /* From this point on, a path exists. */
00327     /* Initialize visited table and support. */
00328     visited = st_init_table(st_ptrcmp, st_ptrhash);
00329 
00330     /* Now get the length of the shortest path(s) from f to 1. */
00331     (void) get_shortest(f, weight, NULL, visited);
00332 
00333     complement = Cudd_IsComplement(f);
00334 
00335     F = Cudd_Regular(f);
00336 
00337     st_lookup(visited, (char *)F, (char **)&my_pair);
00338     
00339     if (complement) {
00340         cost = my_pair->neg;
00341     } else {
00342         cost = my_pair->pos;
00343     }
00344 
00345     st_foreach(visited, free_path_pair, NULL);
00346     st_free_table(visited);
00347 
00348     return(cost);
00349 
00350 } /* end of Cudd_ShortestLength */

00368 DdNode *
00369 Cudd_Decreasing(
00370   DdManager * dd,
00371   DdNode * f,
00372   int  i)
00373 {
00374     unsigned int topf, level;
00375     DdNode *F, *fv, *fvn, *res;
00376     DdNode *(*cacheOp)(DdManager *, DdNode *, DdNode *);
00377 
00378 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00379     assert(0 <= i && i < dd->size);
00380 #endif
00381 
00382     F = Cudd_Regular(f);
00383     topf = cuddI(dd,F->index);
00384 
00385     /* Check terminal case. If topf > i, f does not depend on var.
00386     ** Therefore, f is unate in i.
00387     */
00388     level = (unsigned) dd->perm[i];
00389     if (topf > level) {
00390         return(DD_ONE(dd));
00391     }
00392 
00393     /* From now on, f is not constant. */
00394 
00395     /* Check cache. */
00396     cacheOp = (DdNode *(*)(DdManager *, DdNode *, DdNode *)) Cudd_Decreasing;
00397     res = cuddCacheLookup2(dd,cacheOp,f,dd->vars[i]);
00398     if (res != NULL) {
00399         return(res);
00400     }
00401 
00402     /* Compute cofactors. */
00403     fv = cuddT(F); fvn = cuddE(F);
00404     if (F != f) {
00405         fv = Cudd_Not(fv);
00406         fvn = Cudd_Not(fvn);
00407     }
00408 
00409     if (topf == (unsigned) level) {
00410         /* Special case: if fv is regular, fv(1,...,1) = 1;
00411         ** If in addition fvn is complemented, fvn(1,...,1) = 0.
00412         ** But then f(1,1,...,1) > f(0,1,...,1). Hence f is not
00413         ** monotonic decreasing in i.
00414         */
00415         if (!Cudd_IsComplement(fv) && Cudd_IsComplement(fvn)) {
00416             return(Cudd_Not(DD_ONE(dd)));
00417         }
00418         res = Cudd_bddLeq(dd,fv,fvn) ? DD_ONE(dd) : Cudd_Not(DD_ONE(dd));
00419     } else {
00420         res = Cudd_Decreasing(dd,fv,i);
00421         if (res == DD_ONE(dd)) {
00422             res = Cudd_Decreasing(dd,fvn,i);
00423         }
00424     }
00425 
00426     cuddCacheInsert2(dd,cacheOp,f,dd->vars[i],res);
00427     return(res);
00428 
00429 } /* end of Cudd_Decreasing */
00430 
00431 
00447 DdNode *
00448 Cudd_Increasing(
00449   DdManager * dd,
00450   DdNode * f,
00451   int  i)
00452 {
00453     return(Cudd_Decreasing(dd,Cudd_Not(f),i));
00454 
00455 } /* end of Cudd_Increasing */

00472 int
00473 Cudd_EquivDC(
00474   DdManager * dd,
00475   DdNode * F,
00476   DdNode * G,
00477   DdNode * D)
00478 {
00479     DdNode *tmp;
00480     DdNode *One;
00481     DdNode *Gr;
00482     DdNode *Dr;
00483     DdNode *Fv, *Fvn, *Gv, *Gvn, *Dv, *Dvn;
00484     int res;
00485     unsigned int flevel,glevel,dlevel,top;
00486 
00487     One = DD_ONE(dd);
00488 
00489     /* Check terminal cases. */
00490     if (D == One) return(1);
00491     if (D == DD_ZERO(dd) || D == Cudd_Not(One)) return(F == G);
00492     if (F == G) return(1);
00493     if (F == Cudd_Not(G)) return(0);
00494 
00495     /* From now on, D is non-constant. */
00496 
00497     /* Normalize call to increase cache efficiency. */
00498     if (F > G) {
00499         tmp = F;
00500         F = G;
00501         G = tmp;
00502     }
00503     if (Cudd_IsComplement(F)) {
00504         F = Cudd_Not(F);
00505         G = Cudd_Not(G);
00506     }
00507 
00508     /* From now on, F is regular. */
00509 
00510     /* Check cache. */
00511     tmp = cuddCacheLookup(dd,(DdNode * (*)(DdManager *, DdNode *, DdNode *, DdNode *))Cudd_EquivDC,F,G,D);
00512     if (tmp != NULL) return(tmp == One);
00513 
00514     /* Find splitting variable. */
00515     flevel = cuddI(dd,F->index);
00516     Gr = Cudd_Regular(G);
00517     glevel = cuddI(dd,Gr->index);
00518     top = ddMin(flevel,glevel);
00519     Dr = Cudd_Regular(D);
00520     dlevel = dd->perm[Dr->index];
00521     top = ddMin(top,dlevel);
00522 
00523     /* Compute cofactors. */
00524     if (top == flevel) {
00525         Fv = cuddT(F);
00526         Fvn = cuddE(F);
00527     } else {
00528         Fv = Fvn = F;
00529     }
00530     if (top == glevel) {
00531         Gv = cuddT(Gr);
00532         Gvn = cuddE(Gr);
00533         if (G != Gr) {
00534             Gv = Cudd_Not(Gv);
00535             Gvn = Cudd_Not(Gvn);
00536         }
00537     } else {
00538         Gv = Gvn = G;
00539     }
00540     if (top == dlevel) {
00541         Dv = cuddT(Dr);
00542         Dvn = cuddE(Dr);
00543         if (D != Dr) {
00544             Dv = Cudd_Not(Dv);
00545             Dvn = Cudd_Not(Dvn);
00546         }
00547     } else {
00548         Dv = Dvn = D;
00549     }
00550 
00551     /* Solve recursively. */
00552     res = Cudd_EquivDC(dd,Fv,Gv,Dv);
00553     if (res != 0) {
00554         res = Cudd_EquivDC(dd,Fvn,Gvn,Dvn);
00555     }
00556     cuddCacheInsert(dd,(DdNode * (*)(DdManager *, DdNode *, DdNode *, DdNode *))Cudd_EquivDC,F,G,D,(res) ? One : Cudd_Not(one));
00557 
00558     return(res);
00559 
00560 } /* end of Cudd_EquivDC */
00561 
00562 
00579 int
00580 Cudd_EqualSupNorm(
00581   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
00582   DdNode * f /* first ADD */,
00583   DdNode * g /* second ADD */,
00584   CUDD_VALUE_TYPE  tolerance /* maximum allowed difference */,
00585   int  pr /* verbosity level */)
00586 {
00587     DdNode *fv, *fvn, *gv, *gvn, *r;
00588     unsigned int topf, topg;
00589 
00590     /* Check terminal cases. */
00591     if (f == g) return(1);
00592     if (Cudd_IsConstant(f) && Cudd_IsConstant(g)) {
00593         if (ddEqualVal(cuddV(f),cuddV(g),tolerance)) {
00594             return(1);
00595         } else {
00596             if (pr>0) {
00597                 (void) fprintf(stdout,"Offending nodes:\n");
00598 #if SIZEOF_VOID_P == 8
00599                 (void) fprintf(stdout,"f: address = %lx\t value = %40.30f\n",
00600                                (unsigned long) f, cuddV(f));
00601                 (void) fprintf(stdout,"g: address = %lx\t value = %40.30f\n",
00602                                (unsigned long) g, cuddV(g));
00603 #else
00604                 (void) fprintf(stdout,"f: address = %x\t value = %40.30f\n",
00605                                (unsigned) f, cuddV(f));
00606                 (void) fprintf(stdout,"g: address = %x\t value = %40.30f\n",
00607                                (unsigned) g, cuddV(g));
00608 #endif
00609             }
00610             return(0);
00611         }
00612     }
00613 
00614     /* We only insert the result in the cache if the comparison is
00615     ** successful. Therefore, if we hit we return 1. */
00616     r = cuddCacheLookup2(dd,(DdNode * (*)(DdManager *, DdNode *, DdNode *))Cudd_EqualSupNorm,f,g);
00617     if (r != NULL) {
00618         return(1);
00619     }
00620 
00621     /* Compute the cofactors and solve the recursive subproblems. */
00622     topf = cuddI(dd,f->index);
00623     topg = cuddI(dd,g->index);
00624 
00625     if (topf <= topg) {fv = cuddT(f); fvn = cuddE(f);} else {fv = fvn = f;}
00626     if (topg <= topf) {gv = cuddT(g); gvn = cuddE(g);} else {gv = gvn = g;}
00627 
00628     if (!Cudd_EqualSupNorm(dd,fv,gv,tolerance,pr)) return(0);
00629     if (!Cudd_EqualSupNorm(dd,fvn,gvn,tolerance,pr)) return(0);
00630 
00631     cuddCacheInsert2(dd,(DdNode * (*)(DdManager *, DdNode *, DdNode *))Cudd_EqualSupNorm,f,g,DD_ONE(dd));
00632 
00633     return(1);
00634 
00635 } /* end of Cudd_EqualSupNorm */

00657 static enum st_retval
00658 free_path_pair(
00659   char * key,
00660   char * value,
00661   char * arg)
00662 {
00663     cuddPathPair *pair;
00664 
00665     pair = (cuddPathPair *) value;
00666         FREE(pair);
00667     return(ST_CONTINUE);
00668 
00669 } /* end of free_path_pair */

00690 static cuddPathPair
00691 get_shortest(
00692   DdNode * root,
00693   int * cost,
00694   int * support,
00695   st_table * visited)
00696 {
00697     cuddPathPair *my_pair, res_pair, pair_T, pair_E;
00698     DdNode      *my_root, *T, *E;
00699     int         weight;
00700 
00701     my_root = Cudd_Regular(root);
00702 
00703     if (st_lookup(visited, (char *)my_root, (char **)&my_pair)) {
00704         if (Cudd_IsComplement(root)) {
00705             res_pair.pos = my_pair->neg;
00706             res_pair.neg = my_pair->pos;
00707         } else {
00708             res_pair.pos = my_pair->pos;
00709             res_pair.neg = my_pair->neg;
00710         }
00711         return(res_pair);
00712     }
00713 
00714     /* In the case of a BDD the following test is equivalent to
00715     ** testing whether the BDD is the constant 1. This formulation,
00716     ** however, works for ADDs as well, by assuming the usual
00717     ** dichotomy of 0 and != 0.
00718     */
00719     if (cuddIsConstant(my_root)) {
00720         if (my_root != zero) {
00721             res_pair.pos = 0;
00722             res_pair.neg = DD_BIGGY;
00723         } else {
00724             res_pair.pos = DD_BIGGY;
00725             res_pair.neg = 0;
00726         }
00727     } else {
00728         T = cuddT(my_root);
00729         E = cuddE(my_root);
00730 
00731         pair_T = get_shortest(T, cost, support, visited);
00732         pair_E = get_shortest(E, cost, support, visited);
00733         weight = WEIGHT(cost, my_root->index);
00734         res_pair.pos = ddMin(pair_T.pos+weight, pair_E.pos);
00735         res_pair.neg = ddMin(pair_T.neg+weight, pair_E.neg);
00736 
00737         /* Update support. */
00738         if (support != NULL) {
00739             support[my_root->index] = 1;
00740         }
00741     }
00742 
00743     my_pair = ALLOC(cuddPathPair, 1);
00744     if (my_pair == NULL) {
00745         return(res_pair);
00746     }
00747     my_pair->pos = res_pair.pos;
00748     my_pair->neg = res_pair.neg;
00749 
00750     st_insert(visited, (char *)my_root, (char *)my_pair);
00751     if (Cudd_IsComplement(root)) {
00752         res_pair.pos = my_pair->neg;
00753         res_pair.neg = my_pair->pos;
00754     } else {
00755         res_pair.pos = my_pair->pos;
00756         res_pair.neg = my_pair->neg;
00757     }
00758     return(res_pair);
00759 
00760 } /* end of get_shortest */
00761 
00762 
00781 static DdNode *
00782 get_path(
00783   DdManager * manager,
00784   st_table * visited,
00785   DdNode * f,
00786   int * weight,
00787   int  cost)
00788 {
00789     DdNode      *sol, *tmp;
00790     DdNode      *my_dd, *T, *E;
00791     cuddPathPair *T_pair, *E_pair;
00792     int         Tcost, Ecost;
00793     int         complement;
00794 
00795     my_dd = Cudd_Regular(f);
00796     complement = Cudd_IsComplement(f);
00797 
00798     sol = one;
00799     cuddRef(sol);
00800 
00801     while (!cuddIsConstant(my_dd)) {
00802         Tcost = cost - WEIGHT(weight, my_dd->index);
00803         Ecost = cost;
00804 
00805         T = cuddT(my_dd);
00806         E = cuddE(my_dd);
00807 
00808         if (complement) {T = Cudd_Not(T); E = Cudd_Not(E);}
00809 
00810         st_lookup(visited, (char *)Cudd_Regular(T), (char **)&T_pair);
00811         if ((Cudd_IsComplement(T) && T_pair->neg == Tcost) ||
00812         (!Cudd_IsComplement(T) && T_pair->pos == Tcost)) {
00813             tmp = cuddBddAndRecur(manager,manager->vars[my_dd->index],sol);
00814             if (tmp == NULL) {
00815                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,sol);
00816                 return(NULL);
00817             }
00818             cuddRef(tmp);
00819             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,sol);
00820             sol = tmp;
00821 
00822             complement =  Cudd_IsComplement(T);
00823             my_dd = Cudd_Regular(T);
00824             cost = Tcost;
00825             continue;
00826         }
00827         st_lookup(visited, (char *)Cudd_Regular(E), (char **)&E_pair);
00828         if ((Cudd_IsComplement(E) && E_pair->neg == Ecost) ||
00829         (!Cudd_IsComplement(E) && E_pair->pos == Ecost)) {
00830             tmp = cuddBddAndRecur(manager,Cudd_Not(manager->vars[my_dd->index]),sol);
00831             if (tmp == NULL) {
00832                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,sol);
00833                 return(NULL);
00834             }
00835             cuddRef(tmp);
00836             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,sol);
00837             sol = tmp;
00838             complement = Cudd_IsComplement(E);
00839             my_dd = Cudd_Regular(E);
00840             cost = Ecost;
00841             continue;
00842         }
00843         (void) fprintf(stdout,"We shouldn't be here!!\n");
00844         return(NULL);
00845     }
00846 
00847     cuddDeref(sol);
00848     return(sol);
00849 
00850 } /* end of get_path */
00851 
00852 
00873 static cuddPathPair
00874 get_largest(
00875   DdNode * root,
00876   st_table * visited)
00877 {
00878     cuddPathPair *my_pair, res_pair, pair_T, pair_E;
00879     DdNode      *my_root, *T, *E;
00880 
00881     my_root = Cudd_Regular(root);
00882 
00883     if (st_lookup(visited, (char *)my_root, (char **)&my_pair)) {
00884         if (Cudd_IsComplement(root)) {
00885             res_pair.pos = my_pair->neg;
00886             res_pair.neg = my_pair->pos;
00887         } else {
00888             res_pair.pos = my_pair->pos;
00889             res_pair.neg = my_pair->neg;
00890         }
00891         return(res_pair);
00892     }
00893 
00894     /* In the case of a BDD the following test is equivalent to
00895     ** testing whether the BDD is the constant 1. This formulation,
00896     ** however, works for ADDs as well, by assuming the usual
00897     ** dichotomy of 0 and != 0.
00898     */
00899     if (cuddIsConstant(my_root)) {
00900         if (my_root != zero) {
00901             res_pair.pos = 0;
00902             res_pair.neg = DD_BIGGY;
00903         } else {
00904             res_pair.pos = DD_BIGGY;
00905             res_pair.neg = 0;
00906         }
00907     } else {
00908         T = cuddT(my_root);
00909         E = cuddE(my_root);
00910 
00911         pair_T = get_largest(T, visited);
00912         pair_E = get_largest(E, visited);
00913         res_pair.pos = ddMin(pair_T.pos, pair_E.pos) + 1;
00914         res_pair.neg = ddMin(pair_T.neg, pair_E.neg) + 1;
00915     }
00916 
00917     my_pair = ALLOC(cuddPathPair, 1);
00918     if (my_pair == NULL) {
00919         return(res_pair);
00920     }
00921     my_pair->pos = res_pair.pos;
00922     my_pair->neg = res_pair.neg;
00923 
00924     st_insert(visited, (char *)my_root, (char *)my_pair);
00925     if (Cudd_IsComplement(root)) {
00926         res_pair.pos = my_pair->neg;
00927         res_pair.neg = my_pair->pos;
00928     } else {
00929         res_pair.pos = my_pair->pos;
00930         res_pair.neg = my_pair->neg;
00931     }
00932     return(res_pair);
00933 
00934 } /* end of get_largest */
00935 
00936 
00955 static DdNode *
00956 get_cube(
00957   DdManager * manager,
00958   st_table * visited,
00959   DdNode * f,
00960   int  cost)
00961 {
00962     DdNode      *sol, *tmp;
00963     DdNode      *my_dd, *T, *E;
00964     cuddPathPair *T_pair, *E_pair;
00965     int         Tcost, Ecost;
00966     int         complement;
00967 
00968     my_dd = Cudd_Regular(f);
00969     complement = Cudd_IsComplement(f);
00970 
00971     sol = one;
00972     cuddRef(sol);
00973 
00974     while (!cuddIsConstant(my_dd)) {
00975         Tcost = cost - 1;
00976         Ecost = cost - 1;
00977 
00978         T = cuddT(my_dd);
00979         E = cuddE(my_dd);
00980 
00981         if (complement) {T = Cudd_Not(T); E = Cudd_Not(E);}
00982 
00983         st_lookup(visited, (char *)Cudd_Regular(T), (char **)&T_pair);
00984         if ((Cudd_IsComplement(T) && T_pair->neg == Tcost) ||
00985         (!Cudd_IsComplement(T) && T_pair->pos == Tcost)) {
00986             tmp = cuddBddAndRecur(manager,manager->vars[my_dd->index],sol);
00987             if (tmp == NULL) {
00988                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,sol);
00989                 return(NULL);
00990             }
00991             cuddRef(tmp);
00992             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,sol);
00993             sol = tmp;
00994 
00995             complement =  Cudd_IsComplement(T);
00996             my_dd = Cudd_Regular(T);
00997             cost = Tcost;
00998             continue;
00999         }
01000         st_lookup(visited, (char *)Cudd_Regular(E), (char **)&E_pair);
01001         if ((Cudd_IsComplement(E) && E_pair->neg == Ecost) ||
01002         (!Cudd_IsComplement(E) && E_pair->pos == Ecost)) {
01003             tmp = cuddBddAndRecur(manager,Cudd_Not(manager->vars[my_dd->index]),sol);
01004             if (tmp == NULL) {
01005                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,sol);
01006                 return(NULL);
01007             }
01008             cuddRef(tmp);
01009             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,sol);
01010             sol = tmp;
01011             complement = Cudd_IsComplement(E);
01012             my_dd = Cudd_Regular(E);
01013             cost = Ecost;
01014             continue;
01015         }
01016         (void) fprintf(stdout,"We shouldn't be here!\n");
01017         return(NULL);
01018     }
01019 
01020     cuddDeref(sol);
01021     return(sol);
01022 
01023 } /* end of get_cube */
01024
